24 static gboolean
25 idle_exit_loop (gpointer data)
26 {
27  g_main_loop_quit ((GMainLoop *) data);
28  /* once */
29  return FALSE;
30 }
31 
38 static void cb_typefound ( GstElement *typefind,
39  guint probability,
40  GstCaps *caps,
41  gpointer found_caps
42  )
43 {
44  GstCaps **found_caps_var = found_caps;
45  *found_caps_var = gst_caps_copy(caps);
46  /* since we connect to a signal in the pipeline thread context, we need
47  * to set an idle handler to exit the main loop in the mainloop context.
48  * Normally, your app should not need to worry about such things. */
49  g_idle_add (idle_exit_loop, main_loop);
50 
51 }
52 
60 static GstStructure* type_detection_with_sink(GstBin *pipeline, GstElement *input_video,GstElement *sink ){
61 
62  GstElement *typefind;
63  GstCaps *found_caps;
64 
65  /* Create typefind element */
66  typefind = gst_element_factory_make_log ("typefind", NULL);
67 
68  if(typefind == NULL)
69  return NULL;
70 
71  /* Connect typefind element to handler */
72  g_signal_connect (typefind, "have-type", G_CALLBACK (cb_typefound), &found_caps);
73  gst_bin_add_many (GST_BIN (pipeline), typefind, sink, NULL);
74  gst_element_link_many (input_video, typefind, sink, NULL);
75  gst_element_set_state (GST_ELEMENT (pipeline), GST_STATE_PLAYING);
76 
77  /* run the main loop until type is found so we execute callback function */
78  if( g_main_loop_is_running (main_loop) ){
79  g_main_loop_quit (main_loop);
80  was_running = TRUE; /* save the fact that we have quit the main loop */
81  }
82 
83  /* run the main loop so the typefind can be performed */
84  g_main_loop_run (main_loop);
85 
86  if( internal_error )
87  return NULL;
88 
89  /* Video type found */
90  gst_element_set_state (GST_ELEMENT (pipeline), GST_STATE_NULL);
91 
92  /*Remove typefind and fakesink from pipeline */
93  gst_element_unlink_many( input_video, typefind, sink, NULL);
94  gst_bin_remove(GST_BIN(pipeline), typefind);
95 
96  /* Get video Caps */
97  GstCaps *detected = found_caps;
98  GstStructure *str_detected = gst_caps_get_structure(detected, 0);
99 
100  return str_detected;
101 }
102 
109 GstStructure* type_detection(GstBin *pipeline, GstElement *input_video , GstElement *sink){
110 
111  g_debug("start type detection");
112 
113  GstStructure *str_detected;
114  if (sink == NULL){
115  GstElement *fakesink;
116  fakesink = gst_element_factory_make_log ("fakesink", SINK_TYPEFIND_NAME );
117  if(fakesink == NULL)
118  return NULL;
119 
120  str_detected = type_detection_with_sink(pipeline, input_video, fakesink);
121  gst_bin_remove(GST_BIN(pipeline), fakesink);
122 
123  }else{
124  str_detected = type_detection_with_sink( pipeline, input_video, sink);
125  }
126  return str_detected;
127 }

135 GstElement *type_detection_element_for_roi( GstBin *pipeline ) {
136 
137  GstElement *typefind;
138 
139  g_debug("start type detection for ROI");
140 
141  /* Create typefind element */
142  typefind = gst_element_factory_make_log ("typefind", TYPEFIND_ROI_NAME );
143 
144  if(typefind == NULL)
145  return NULL;
146 
147  if ( ! gst_bin_add (pipeline, typefind)){
148  g_critical("could not add %s in pipeline", TYPEFIND_ROI_NAME);
149  return NULL;
150  }
151 
152  //gst_element_set_state (GST_ELEMENT (typefind), GST_STATE_NULL);
153 
154  return typefind ;
155 
156 }

161 GstStructure* type_detection_for_roi(GstBin *pipeline , GstElement *sink ){
162 
163 
164 
165  GstCaps *found_caps;
166 
167  /* retrieve typefind roi element for pipeline */
168  GstElement *typefind_roi = gst_bin_get_by_name ( pipeline , TYPEFIND_ROI_NAME ) ;
169  if ( !typefind_roi )
170  return NULL;
171 
172 
173  /* Connect typefind element to handler */
174  g_signal_connect (typefind_roi, "have-type", G_CALLBACK (cb_typefound), &found_caps);
175  /* run the main loop so the typefind can be performed */
176  gst_element_set_state (GST_ELEMENT (pipeline), GST_STATE_NULL);
177  gst_element_link (typefind_roi, sink);
178  gst_element_set_state (GST_ELEMENT (pipeline), GST_STATE_PLAYING);
179 
180  /* run the main loop until type is found so we execute callback function */
181  if( g_main_loop_is_running (main_loop) ){
182  g_main_loop_quit (main_loop);
183  was_running = TRUE; /* save the fact that we have quit the main loop */
184  }
185 
186  g_main_loop_run (main_loop);
187 
188  if( internal_error )
189  return NULL;
190 
191  /* Video type found */
192  gst_element_set_state (GST_ELEMENT (typefind_roi), GST_STATE_NULL);
193 
194  /* unlink typefind and sink */
195  gst_element_unlink (typefind_roi, sink);
196 
197 
198  /* Get video Caps */
199  GstCaps *detected = found_caps;
200  GstStructure *str_detected = gst_caps_get_structure(detected, 0);
201 
202  return str_detected;
203 
204 }
